title: Dragon Robe
description: Robe of embroidered dark blue satin. Nine five-clawed dragons in gold. Loose tight-headed clouds, bats, and flowers in shades of blue, green, peach, pink, red, yellow, and tan. Border of rolling clouds, bats, swastikas, and other symbols. Cuffs and collar band embroidered with dragons, bats, clouds, etc. Edging in gold brocade. Chiefly satin and couched stitch. Lining of pale gray floral damask.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
